name: Mortal Reminder
passive: Grievous Wounds: Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemies for 3 seconds.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Attack Speed. Passive effect: Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemies for 3 seconds.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The penetration helps maintain damage relevance as the game progresses
Great for assassins looking to eliminate priority targets
The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
